item.title: YouTube Channel Recommendations
item.description: I have recently been binging on YouTube videos. Here are some channel recommendations with an example video. General Science (Math, Physics and much more) Link to heading Veritasium Example Video: The man who killed millions and saved billions 3Blue1Brown Example Video: The essence of Calculus Minutephysics Example Video: How to see without glasses? Philosophy and Psychology Link to heading Academy Of Ideas Example Video: Nietzsche and Psychology: How To Become Who You Are
